item.title: Collector's Fallacy
item.description: To know about something is not the same as knowing something. The idea here is that we like collecting information, hoping that it will be useful down the way.

item.title: Zettel
item.description: Essentially, a single note on one particular topic! The anatomy of a zettel looks like: Unique Identifier: an unambiguous address This is mandatory!

item.title: Zettelkasten
item.description: Note: I’m referencing zettelkasten.de to understand how to incorporate this into my daily note-taking! Contrary to what a “[[Zettel]]” should be, i.
